## Description

This is the repo to compute regression model with heteroscedastic error.

## The Model

$$
  y(x)=f^\top(x) \beta + e/\sqrt{\lambda(x)} = \sum_{i=1}^p f_i(x) \beta_i + e / \sqrt{\lambda(x) } 
$$
